home.h2: I am a Software Developer from Glasgow, Scotland.

about.title: About
about.education: First Class degree in BSc Hons Web and Mobile Development.
about.copy:
I am a software developer from Glasgow, Scotland who specialises in web applications. I have extensive experience with both frontend and backend development, which allows me to build and deploy powerful, beautiful applications.

I mostly develop in PHP and JavaScript and have many years using the LAMP stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP). I also love building applications using Node.js, VueJS and using that sweet ES6 (with cross platform support of course!). Often I dive in to new frameworks and stacks that the open source community come up with!

contact.title: Contact
contact.copy: Although I am not actively looking for freelance work at the moment, if you have an awesome project idea, I may be interested in helping out! You can feel free to contact me and I will try and respond ASAP.
